nodes.name: Sticky Note
nodes.description: Allows capturing Notes on the Workflow

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: comment
fields.value: This workflow calculates variables for clustering like avg monthly purchase, unique number of products, the total number of product, the total number of invoices
fields.title: Comment

nodes.name: Sticky Note
nodes.description: Allows capturing Notes on the Workflow

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
Following features are computed here:

  • AVG_MONTHLY_PURCHASE - Average Monthly Purchase value by a Customer
  • AVG_INVOICE_PURCHASE - Average Invoice value
  • TOTAL_UNIQUE_PRD - Count of Unique Products bought by a Customer
  • TOTAL_NO_INVOICE - Count of Invoices generated for a Customer
  • AVG_PRD_IN_INVOICE - Average count of Products per Invoice
fields.title: Comment
